title: How the UK Could Remove Former Prince Andrew From the Royal Line of Succession
summary_full: Despite his connections with the sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, the former prince is eighth in line to the British throne. That could change.
summary_public: Despite his connections with the sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, the former prince is eighth in line to the British throne. That could change.
